files.name: AME Wizard
files.description: The Ultimate tool for modifying Windows. This is used for essentially running registry tweaks and powershell scripts in the form of playbooks (ReviOS). Much safer than using unknown distributed ISO mods.

files.name: ReviOS Playbook
files.description: ReviOS is a customized version of Windows, designed to be lightweight, stable, and focused on improving performance, privacy and compatibility. This is the primary layer for optimization tweaks and is the best combination of performance without breaking core Windows functionality.

files.name: optimizer
files.description: Optimizer is used to apply specific system tweaks on fresh installs. This is layer one of any optimization tweaks.

files.name: WinMemoryCleaner
files.description: Utility that uses native Windows features to optimize memory areas.

files.name: Windows On Reins [EXPERT-OPTIONAL]
files.description: Only use this if you know what you are doing (explained in the Guide and not used in the screenshots). This is for pure performance and the Powershell script to dramatically harden, debloat, optimize, enhance privacy, avoid fingerprinting and improve performance on Windows 10 and 11 but it breaks many things.

files.name: SecureUxTheme
files.description: A secure boot compatible in-memory UltraUxTheme patcher // used for applying modded msstyles themes and complex themes.

files.name: 7TSP
files.description: Patches .mun files allowing for custom icons/icon packs.

files.name: ExplorerBlurMica
files.description: Add background blur effect, Acrylic or Mica effect to Explorer.

files.name: ExplorerBgTool
files.description: Tool that allows users to have a custom background image for Windows 11  within Explorer.

files.name: DWMBlurGlass
files.description: Add custom effects to the global system title bar and other core Windows applications.

files.name: Windhawk
files.description: The customization marketplace for Windows programs - used for various Windows 11 taskbar mods and animation cleanup.

files.name: ExplorerPatcher
files.description: Modifies the start menu // better version is StartIsBack this is just a free alternative!

files.name: RightClickCompress
files.description: Adds a right click menu option to compress image and video files.

files.name: mactype
files.description: Better font rendering for Windows // set to service mode

files.name: Chawye Hsu's MacType Profile
files.description: Better font rendering for Windows // set to service mode.

files.name: TranslucentTB
files.description: A lightweight utility that makes the Windows taskbar translucent/transparent.

files.name: Rainmeter
files.description: Rainmeter allows you to display customizable skins on your desktop.

files.name: MicaForEveryone
files.description: Mica For Everyone is a tool to enable backdrop effects on the title bars of Win32 apps on Windows 11.

files.path: powershell -Command 'Install-PackageProvider -Name NuGet -Force | Out-Null; Install-Module -Name Microsoft.WinGet.Client -Force -Repository PSGallery | Out-Null; Repair-WinGetPackageManager'
files.name: winget
files.description: WinGet is the Windows Package Manager.

files.name: UniGetUI
files.description: UniGetUI is a GUI that can fetch, update and repackage winget applications. Manage winget apps as if its the Microsoft store!

files.name: Powertoys
files.description: Microsoft PowerToys is a set of utilities for power users to tune and streamline their Windows experience for greater productivity.

files.name: Powershell 7
files.description: Powershell 7 is much more updated

files.name: FFmpeg
files.description: A complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and stream audio and video; added to PATH automatically

files.name: Microsoft.DotNet.DesktopRuntime.5
files.description: Core runtime application

files.description: Core runtime application

files.description: Core runtime application

files.name: FileConverter
files.description: File Converter is a very simple tool which allows you to convert and compress files using the context menu in windows explorer

files.name: ImageGlass
files.description: A lightweight, versatile image viewer

files.name: K-LiteCodecPack
files.description: An incredibly lightweight video player (and fast)

files.name: Peazip
files.description: A free file archiver utility and rar extractor for Windows and Linux (better than WinRAR and no popup)

files.name: Winaero Tweaker
files.description: Winaero Tweaker is a GUI that allows you to customize the appearance and behavior of the operating system in a flexible way.

files.name: ShareX
files.description: Screen capture, file sharing and productivity tool

files.name: NVCleanstall
files.description: NVCleanstall lets you customize the NVIDIA GeForce Driver package by removing components that you don't need (or want); used for removing telemetry and memory footprint. For NVIDIA GPUs only.

files.name: Ungoogled-Chromium
files.description: Chromium but without the Google. Incredibly fast and lightweight with configurations for privacy + ease of use.

files.name: Chris Titus Tech's Windows Utility
files.description: Install Programs, Tweaks, Fixes, and Updates // Layer 02 for configuring Windows quickly. Use the config file provided in /config.
